title: RADS Error HELP TRIED EVERYTHINGGGG!
body: Please help me!!! Everytime i try to launch LOL i get the RADS Error message telling me "Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access." I have tried doing the dns server fix thing and that didnt work... then i tried uninstalling LOL and reinstalling and it still wont launch! it just gives me that error message! please tell me what to do so i can play the game again!!!

replies.body:
These types of errors only show up if your connection to our servers is *really unstable*. Working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start since this issue is often caused by local network settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if this helped.
